name: Knockout
note:
State #1 will be automatically added when
HP reaches 0.

name: INT Up
note:
for marc

<Help Description>
 Increases INT by \C[14]10%\C[0]. This effect can stack up to 10 times.
</Help Description>
<Custom Apply Effect>
target.increaseStateCounter(2, 1, 10);
target.increaseParam(4, 0.1);
</Custom Apply Effect>
<Custom Remove Effect>
target.resetParam(4);
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: The Results Are In
note:
from jhonny

<reAddBattler>
<Hide Turns>
<Help Description>
 Grants an additional action. Increases ATK & INT by \C[14]40%\C[0]. 
</Help Description>
<Custom Apply Effect>
target.increaseParam(2, 0.4);
target.increaseParam(4, 0.4);
</Custom Apply Effect>
<Custom Remove Effect>
target.resetParam(2);
target.resetParam(4);
</Custom Remove Effect>
